text: Va [hamcunin] gunohe nest ʙar kasone, ki cun nazdat omadand, to [ʙaroi raftan ʙa cihod ʙar cahorpoe] savorason kuni, [ʙa onon] gufti: «Cize pajdo namekunam, ki sumoro ʙar on ʙinsonam». Onon ʙozgastand, dar hole ki casmonason az in anduh askʙor ʙud, ki cize namejoʙand, to [dar rohi cihod] xarc kunand
